scripts.updateDB: npm run resetDB && npx knex migrate:latest && npm run seedDB
scripts.updateDBDev: npm run resetDB --env development && npx knex migrate:latest --env development && npm run seedDB --env development
scripts.updateDBTest: npm run resetDB --env testing && npx knex migrate:latest --env testing
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix client --only=dev && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
